protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-AFFY-3
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings were grown on MS media for 14 days
The seedlings were immersed in MS (liquid) +10 uM BA for 60 minutes. Control samples where immersed in dimethylsulphoxide (DMSO) for 60 minutes.
Total RNA was isolated using the RNeasy plant kit according to the manufacturer's instructions (Qiagen)
